cobblemon.mark.radical_mark.title: Radical
cobblemon.mark.radical_mark.desc: Captured in a Radical Raid, has new moves or abilities.
cobblemon.move.aquafang.desc: The user bites the target with water-infused fangs. This may make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.sonicslash.desc: The user slashes the target at high speed. The faster the user is compared to the target, the greater the move's power.
cobblemon.ability.blazingsoul.desc: Gives priority to Fire-type moves when HP is full.
cobblemon.ability.bluntforce.desc: Boosts the power of contact moves, but removes their secondary effects.
cobblemon.ability.bonezone.desc: Bone moves ignore resistances and can hit Flying-types or Levitate users.
cobblemon.ability.bullrush.desc: Boosts Attack and Speed on the first turn the Pokémon is in battle.
cobblemon.ability.quillrush.desc: Boosts Attack and Speed on the first turn the Pokémon is in battle.
cobblemon.ability.fatalprecision.desc: Super effective moves deal 20% more damage and cannot miss.
cobblemon.ability.felineprowess.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's Special Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.mountaineer.desc: The Pokémon is immune to Rock-type moves and Stealth Rock upon entry.
cobblemon.ability.sagepower.desc: Boosts Special Attack by 50%, but only allows the use of one move.
cobblemon.ability.selfsufficient.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP every turn.
cobblemon.battle.heal.selfsufficient: %1$s restored a little HP by fending for itself!
cobblemon.ability.striker.desc: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 20%.
cobblemon.species.lapras-radical.desc: This reclusive Lapras has inhabited a large local lake, adapting to the myths and legends told around it over time, growing more draconic in nature.
cobblemon.species.arbok-radical.desc: Exposure to ruthless territorial conflicts hardened this Arbok’s venomous instincts into predatory cruelty, giving it a darker, more calculating nature.
cobblemon.species.beartic-radical.desc: Forced to battle rivals for scarce prey, this Beartic developed powerful martial techniques, blending brute strength with icy endurance.
cobblemon.species.bellossom-radical.desc: Living near ancient groves touched by mystical energies caused this Bellossom’s graceful dances to take on an enchanting, fairy-like power.
cobblemon.species.electivire-radical.des: Constant sparring and physical combat refined this Electivire’s electrical output into disciplined, close-quarters fighting techniques.
cobblemon.species.falinks-radical.desc: Evolving alongside swarming insects, this Falinks adapted chitinous armor and hive-like coordination without losing its battle-hardened tactics.
cobblemon.species.farfetchd-radical.desc: Training under relentless winds and aerial duels honed this Farfetch’d into a nimble airborne warrior.
cobblemon.species.golduck-radical.desc: Intense mental strain awakened this Golduck’s latent psychic abilities, reshaping its watery focus into cerebral power.
cobblemon.species.gorebyss-radical.desc: Dwelling in bioluminescent reefs imbued this Gorebyss with mesmerizing beauty and fairy-like allure.
cobblemon.species.granbull-radical.desc: Years of territorial brawls tempered this Granbull’s fierce demeanor into a formidable blend of brute force and stubborn resolve.
cobblemon.species.grapploct-radical.desc: Constant combat against coastal predators sharpened this Grapploct’s grappling style into an art of disciplined combat.
cobblemon.species.huntail-radical.desc: Living in pitch-black depths turned this Huntail into a ruthless ambusher, its watery nature twisted by predatory darkness.
cobblemon.species.illumise-radical.desc: This Illumise adapted its signaling lights into playful yet deceptive fairy magic, confusing foes and allies alike.
cobblemon.species.raichu-radical.desc: This Raichu thrives in towns and cities, using controlled electricity to assist daily tasks, making it unusually adaptable.
cobblemon.species.ledian-radical.desc: Harsh survival conditions forced this Ledian to abandon fragile grace, developing powerful punching techniques to endure combat.
cobblemon.species.lopunny-radical.desc: Rigorous physical training reshaped this Lopunny’s agility into a disciplined fighting style without losing its speed.
cobblemon.species.lurantis-radical.desc: This Lurantis honed its bladed leaves through constant duels, evolving into a precise and relentless martial combatant.
cobblemon.species.luvdisc-radical.desc: Absorbing ambient emotional energy transformed this Luvdisc’s gentle nature into a surprisingly potent fairy affinity.
cobblemon.species.luxray-radical.desc: Living among ruthless nocturnal predators taught this Luxray to stalk silently, channeling its electricity with predatory intent.
cobblemon.species.masquerain-radical.des: Adapting to flooded wetlands allowed this Masquerain to blend aquatic movement with its natural insect agility.
cobblemon.species.meganium-radical.desc: Exposure to ancient ley lines awakened this Meganium’s nurturing aura into powerful fairy magic.
cobblemon.species.mismagius-radical.desc: This Mismagius embraced playful enchantment over malice, refining its ghostly tricks into refined fairy illusions.
cobblemon.species.pincurchin-radical.des: Living in tidal pools infused with electrical currents taught this Pincurchin to manipulate both water and lightning.
cobblemon.species.rapidash-radical.desc: Legends surrounding this Rapidash caused its flames to take on a mystical quality, blending fiery speed with fairy grace.
cobblemon.species.samurott-radical.desc: Refining its combat style with hardened shells and blades, this Samurott became a disciplined steel-clad warrior.
cobblemon.species.sceptile-radical.desc: Exposure to ancient draconic ruins awakened primal instincts within this Sceptile, altering its growth and power.
cobblemon.species.sunflora-radical.desc: Endless sunlight and volcanic soil caused this Sunflora’s solar energy to manifest as intense, burning heat.
cobblemon.species.tropius-radical.desc: Generations spent soaring near ancient mythical territories subtly transformed this Tropius’s biology toward draconic traits.
cobblemon.species.venomoth-radical.desc: Continuous exposure to psychic emissions reshaped this Venomoth’s mind, amplifying its already potent powders.
cobblemon.species.volbeat-radical.desc: This Volbeat adapted its bioluminescent signals into electrical pulses, allowing it to communicate through flashes of energy.
